version.name: v1
version.xform: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="pncbaby"> <pncbaby id="8" name="PNC (baby)"> <staffId/> <facilityId/> <date/> <motechId/> <visitNumber/> <weight/> <temperature/> <location/> <house/> <community/> <referred/> <maleInvolved/> <respiration/> <cordConditionNormal/> <babyConditionGood/> <bcg/> <opv0/> <comments/> <formtype>data_entry</formtype> <formname>childpnc-jf</formname> </pncbaby> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="staffId" nodeset="/pncbaby/staffId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind id="facilityId" nodeset="/pncbaby/facilityId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="date" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future" nodeset="/pncbaby/date" required="true()" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xf:bind id="motechId" nodeset="/pncbaby/motechId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". > 999999 and . < 10000000" message="MoTeCH ID must be 7 digits long"/> <xf:bind id="visitNumber" nodeset="/pncbaby/visitNumber" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 0.2 and . <= 11" id="weight" message="Value out of range: must be between 0.2 and 11" nodeset="/pncbaby/weight" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 30 and . <= 48" id="temperature" message="Value out of range: must be between 30 and 48" nodeset="/pncbaby/temperature" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xf:bind id="location" nodeset="/pncbaby/location" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="house" nodeset="/pncbaby/house" relevant="/pncbaby/location = '2'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="community" nodeset="/pncbaby/community" relevant="/pncbaby/location = '2'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="referred" nodeset="/pncbaby/referred" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="maleInvolved" nodeset="/pncbaby/maleInvolved" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 10 and . <= 100" id="respiration" message="Value out of range: must be between 10 and 100" nodeset="/pncbaby/respiration" required="true()" type="xsd:int"/> <xf:bind id="cordConditionNormal" nodeset="/pncbaby/cordConditionNormal" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="babyConditionGood" nodeset="/pncbaby/babyConditionGood" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="bcg" nodeset="/pncbaby/bcg" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="opv0" nodeset="/pncbaby/opv0" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="comments" nodeset="/pncbaby/comments" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="formtype" nodeset="/pncbaby/formtype" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="formname" nodeset="/pncbaby/formname" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> </xf:model> <xf:group id="1"> <xf:label>Page2</xf:label> <xf:input bind="staffId"> <xf:label>Staff ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="facilityId"> <xf:label>Facility ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="date"> <xf:label>Visit date</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="motechId"> <xf:label>MoTeCH ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="visitNumber"> <xf:label>Visit number</xf:label> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>PNC 1</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>PNC 2</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>PNC 3</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="weight"> <xf:label>Weight (Kg)</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="temperature"> <xf:label>Temperature (C)</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="location"> <xf:label>Location</xf:label> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>Facility or clinic</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>Home</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>Outreach</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="house"> <xf:label>House</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="community"> <xf:label>Community</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="referred"> <xf:label>Referred</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="maleInvolved"> <xf:label>Male involvement</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="respiration"> <xf:label>Respiration</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="cordConditionNormal"> <xf:label>Cord condition</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Normal</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>Abnormal</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="babyConditionGood"> <xf:label>Baby condition</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Good</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>Bad</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="bcg"> <xf:label>BCG</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="opv0"> <xf:label>OPV</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="comments"> <xf:label>Comments</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formtype">
